scripts.codegen: yarn run codegen:schema && yarn run codegen:graph
scripts.prepare-codegen: func() { yarn run --silent mustache "../../config/$1.json" subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen; }; func
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn graph deploy mstable/mstable-staking-ropsten --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn graph deploy mstable/mstable-staking --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
